amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to add universities to the list of entities that the Secretary of the Army Corps should consider when submitting a report to Congress on the use of innovative materials in water resource development projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Soto.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
